titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4299) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1995 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-766, by Mr. Beilenson.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 4299. All points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill H.R. 4299 and against its consideration are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 234.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/29/1994--Introduced. Waives points of order against the conference report to accompany H. H. R. 4299 (authorizing appropriations for fiscal year 1995 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities).
